title: S&P 500 Notches Weekly Gain as Tech Stocks Lead Rally
description: A rally in mega-cap technology stocks helped drive the S&P 500 to a weekly gain as traders weighed an uptick in US consumer sentiment against expectations for volatility with a record options expiration.
content: A rally in mega-cap technology stocks helped drive the S&P 500 to a weekly gain as traders weighed an uptick in US consumer sentiment against expectations for volatility with a record options expiration.
